PAGINATION_MENU.TITLE: Pagination
PAGINATION_MENU.DESCRIPTION:
This is the help page for the Pagination menu.
The following is an explanation for the reaction emojis.
PAGINATION_MENU.FIELD_EMOJIS_TEXT_A:
{{first}} Go to the first page.
{{prev}} Go back one page, or loop to the last page if at the first one.
{{stop}} Stops the interactive menu.
{{next}} Go forward one page, or loop to the first page if at the last one.
{{last}} Go to the last page.
{{info}} Toggle this menu.
PAGINATION_MENU.FIELD_EMOJIS_TEXT_B:
{{first}} Go to the first page.
{{prev}} Go back one page, or loop to the last page if at the first one.
{{stop}} Stops the interactive menu.
{{next}} Go forward one page, or loop to the first page if at the last one.
{{last}} Go to the last page.
{{info}} Toggle this menu.
{{additional}} Shows an additional information page that is relevant to the topic.
PAGINATION_MENU.EXPIRED_MANUAL: The interactive menu has been successfully terminated.

ERRORS.MISSING_PERM_MORE:
I need the following permissions to run the `{{command}}` command:

ERRORS.PERM_LEVEL: You don't have the permission to run this command. The minumim permission is: **{{name}}** [{{level}}]
ERRORS.PAGINATION: You already have a pagination menu open! Close it or wait for it to expire and retry.
ERRORS.UNAVAILABLE_FLAVOR: This command isn't available in this version of the bot. Contact the Developer to know more.
